data.Name: Mark Hutchinson
data.staff_bio: Mark is the research department\\'s data entry person and performs all its data entry work. He has been with ICI since October of 1997. Before coming here he attended the Cotting School in Lexington, MA, from which he graduated in June of 1997. It is a school for people with physical or learning disabilities. Mark has cerebral palsy and uses a headpointer to type.
